items.name: Shelf life
items.details: A half onion lasts up to 7-10 days in the fridge if stored properly.

items.name: Wrap tightly
items.details: Use plastic wrap, beeswax wrap, or an airtight container.

items.name: Store cut-side down
items.details: Reduces moisture loss and odor spread.

items.name: Spoilage signs
items.details: Toss it if it feels slimy, smells sour, or looks discolored.
